titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation and enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the Diocess of Sarum. In the episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God Seth by divine permission Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Salisbury. Bishop (1667-1689 : Ward)
Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ja. Collins at the King-Arms in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
